item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Here's What's On This Evening - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Here's What's On This Evening - NEWSBTC

Here's what we are focusing on this evening in the bitcoin price. Trades, parameters and risk levels. Things are drawing to close in the European session, and it's time to perform our second analysis of the day in our bitcoin price watch strategy.

item.title: Incentivized Model a Healthy Way to Encourage Blockchain Growth?
item.description:
Incentivized Model a Healthy Way to Encourage Blockchain Growth?

A core issue of Bitcoin's scalability debate centers around blockchain network strength and continued decentralization as the digital currency's user base continues to grow. Disclaimer: This article was provided by the Vanbex Group. Bitcoinist is not affiliated with the firms represented by the Vanbex Group and is not responsible for their products and/or services.

item.title: Industry Report: Bitcoin Thieves Abound As Popularity Skyrockets
item.description:
Industry Report: Bitcoin Thieves Abound As Popularity Skyrockets

Kraken grows its empire, a new strain of malware is spreading, and a bitcoin auction occurs in Australia. Want to catch up on the latest digital currency news? Take a look at the stories below.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Analysis: Market Chooses Consolidation
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Analysis: Market Chooses Consolidation

Bitcoin price continues trading into a narrowing range and the market seems to have foregone decline in favor of consolidation. The consolidation floor and expectations going forward are discussed below. This analysis is provided by xbt.social with a 3-hour delay. Read the full analysis here. Not a member?

item.title: How Investors Can Protect Themselves Against Bitcoin Scams
item.description:
How Investors Can Protect Themselves Against Bitcoin Scams

To safeguard themselves from scams within the cryptocurrency ecosystem, investors must avoid being greedy, be logical in their analysis of opportunities and dedicate time and resources to research and education. Complaints about loss of investments within the crypto space is becoming a common occurrence.

item.title: One More Mining Difficulty Adjustment Before The Bitcoin Halving
item.description:
One More Mining Difficulty Adjustment Before The Bitcoin Halving

The Bitcoin halving is drawing ever closer, and the community is getting excited. This is only the second time the Bitcoin block reward will be cut in half, and it is a significant milestone for this cryptocurrency. But it looks like there will be one more mining difficulty adjustment before the halving, which may throw off all countdown timers.

item.title: The Securities Law Implications of the DAO Hack and Proposed Ethereum Hard Fork
item.description:
The Securities Law Implications of the DAO Hack and Proposed Ethereum Hard Fork

The top five blockchain crowdsales bore out of the Bitcoin 2.0 movement have raised more than a quarter-of-a-billion dollars in "initial coin offerings," "token sales" and the like. Participants contend the blockchain tokens are going "to the moon." Others argue, since they've never been registered, they run afoul of securities law.

item.title: Specter of Ethereum Hard Fork Worries Australian Banking Group - CoinDesk
item.description:
Specter of Ethereum Hard Fork Worries Australian Banking Group - CoinDesk

Everywhere the ethereum community looks for a solution to regaining control of $60m worth of funds from The DAO, obstacles lay in its path. After news yesterday that a proposed soft fork solution carried with it a previously unidentified exploit, we saw what might lay in wait in terms of repetitional impact if the proposed hard fork is implemented.

item.title: Microgaming UK Sees Benefits of Bitcoin In The Gambling Industry
item.description:
Microgaming UK Sees Benefits of Bitcoin In The Gambling Industry

There is a clear link between Bitcoin and online gambling. The privacy aspect of cryptocurrency makes it a perfect tool for wagering money online. Casinos and sports betting platforms have seen the value of this concept as well. But the attraction goes well beyond Bitcoin as a currency.

item.title: Ethereum Crises Deepens; SoftFork Out, HardFork Decision in Just 16 Days
item.description:
Ethereum Crises Deepens; SoftFork Out, HardFork Decision in Just 16 Days

The Ethereum community is in emergency mode as showstoping findings from the Cornell team sent the soft-fork option out. The only choice now available is whether to hard-fork or not, a decision that must be made in just 16 days.
